XScalerAperture Struct Reference

#include <xscaler.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The XScalerAperture data structure for Aperture and scale factor control. The scale factor values are calculated using the field in this structure


Public Attributes

u32 InLastLine
u32 InFirstPixel
